response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both of us. I understand its worth to you and am eager to facilitate this transaction. My offer for the product is $2,000,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also acknowledges the importance of this opportunity for both parties involved. I believe this proposal presents an excellent chance for mutual benefit. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 2000000}
